name: Keith Chester
description: A Robotics Engineer turned software developer, Keith is head of R&D @ Fusion Marketing. There he oversees projects from websites to robotic art installations and more. He's the organizer for [node.jSTL](https://www.meetup.com/node-jSTL/) and [jSTL](https://www.meetup.com/jstl-meetup/). He's always open for talking about tech!
